title: Ich bin so mad. Danke für den bann.
body:
Spiel 1
Im Spiel
4rK1nG: I will steal this
4rK1nG: kayn is rip now
4rK1nG: dont
4rK1nG: push
4rK1nG: let them lose exp
4rK1nG: dude
4rK1nG: now u can
4rK1nG: int
4rK1nG: wtf
4rK1nG: actually a weird game
4rK1nG: barriere wasnt up fast enough
4rK1nG: 4 kills kaisa can actually finish item
4rK1nG: kayn actually trapped us
4rK1nG: she got hooked.
4rK1nG: u see this
4rK1nG: and then flame
4rK1nG: they perma push
4rK1nG: kayn dives u
4rK1nG: u dont even move bot side
4rK1nG: trundle dont move
4rK1nG: ik i got caught
4rK1nG: we getting dived
4rK1nG: how to def that
4rK1nG: tell me garen
4rK1nG: How def that?
4rK1nG: we get dived
4rK1nG: 3 times
4rK1nG: and u call us bad
4rK1nG: idk man
4rK1nG: u play garen
4rK1nG: and talk
4rK1nG: gj
4rK1nG: ori go top
4rK1nG: sure garen
4rK1nG: u chase for kill
4rK1nG: and die
4rK1nG: we get dived
4rK1nG: yes
4rK1nG: report garen afk
4rK1nG: ah and for perma flame ty
4rK1nG: we get dived 4 times
4rK1nG: we get dived 4 times trundle didnt gank 1
4rK1nG: report garen just do it
4rK1nG: WHATA
4rK1nG: yes sure omg
4rK1nG: Im not toxic at all
4rK1nG: well I wont get banned for doing nothing. reporting me wont help ya
4rK1nG: but gareen u got mine
4rK1nG: garen afk reportable
4rK1nG: funny game
4rK1nG: so fun
4rK1nG: yes I wont get banned for nothing so well
4rK1nG: u can report me
4rK1nG: Im not inting xD
4rK1nG: actually garen ur afk
4rK1nG: ur the one who gets reported
4rK1nG: trundle
4rK1nG: why gank 0 times
4rK1nG: while kayn perma dives
4rK1nG: and then talk
4rK1nG: Looks like u cant even write english lol
4rK1nG: yes toxic sure
4rK1nG: he perma blames me
4rK1nG: but suree im the flamer
4rK1nG: reprot
4rK1nG: yes
4rK1nG: muted all i wont write anymore to u gus
4rK1nG: guys lets be fair and report garen and trundle permanently flaming
4rK1nG: this garen is afk
4rK1nG: and still flaming
4rK1nG: 2 shots 800 dmg :D
4rK1nG: garen carries this
4rK1nG: XD
4rK1nG: NASH HAHA
4rK1nG: just do it lol
4rK1nG: so
4rK1nG: cuz he was afk for like 5 min
4rK1nG: perma blame and flame
4rK1nG: sure u can report me for nothing haha
4rK1nG: what did I actually do
4rK1nG: cuz he went afk
4rK1nG: and flamed hard
4rK1nG: u didnt see our team chat
4rK1nG: they perma insult and blame
4rK1nG: Im not toxic at all but if u think that
4rK1nG: cant change ur mind
4rK1nG: if u could see the spam pings
4rK1nG: bg
Nach dem Spiel
4rK1nG: ty guys for perma flaming
4rK1nG: ...
4rK1nG: sure
Spiel 2
Vor dem Spiel
4rK1nG: rly zec
4rK1nG: zed
Im Spiel
4rK1nG: xd yy
4rK1nG: ty
4rK1nG: zed lel
4rK1nG: y kinda
4rK1nG: gj top
4rK1nG: gj bot too
4rK1nG: Now i lucked like u
4rK1nG: fair
4rK1nG: Lol dont say that :C
4rK1nG: gj
4rK1nG: sjasdjadsjkadsjkads
4rK1nG: OH CMN
4rK1nG: the mid lane camp is actually real
4rK1nG: shyv can u gank mid?
4rK1nG: gg
4rK1nG: ur jgl turned mid
4rK1nG: better jgl wins
4rK1nG: shyv why say that
4rK1nG: kayn ganked mid and won it
4rK1nG: this time
4rK1nG: lol sure
4rK1nG: we have no jgl.
4rK1nG: gg :D
4rK1nG: we can open
4rK1nG: Lol kid why talk
4rK1nG: sora its lost anyways
4rK1nG: kayn ganked
4rK1nG: shyv didnt
4rK1nG: y i was perma dead cuz of kayn
4rK1nG: how roam then
4rK1nG: WOW
4rK1nG: well ty for the heal sora
4rK1nG: shyv farming mid
4rK1nG: xDD
4rK1nG: poor shyv
4rK1nG: cant even jgl
4rK1nG: u arent good either
4rK1nG: I won lane
4rK1nG: u got camped
4rK1nG: lol
4rK1nG: kayn pushed that tower
4rK1nG: xD
4rK1nG: kayn just carried u
4rK1nG: dont lie omg
4rK1nG: gj
4rK1nG: sure
4rK1nG: Lol
4rK1nG: lol why cant shyv gank too=
4rK1nG: lol alistar kicked me into u
4rK1nG: xD
4rK1nG: lel
4rK1nG: had no vision
4rK1nG: I flash away from soraka
4rK1nG: im so good
4rK1nG: np
4rK1nG: yes keep farming
4rK1nG: xD
4rK1nG: Lol
4rK1nG: u have a jgl bg
Nach dem Spiel
4rK1nG: nice jungler
4rK1nG: got my report
4rK1nG: afk farming mid
4rK1nG: and then talk



Was hat das Spiel aus mir gemacht?

4rK1nG: well I wont get banned for doing nothing. reporting me wont help ya
